Plintissa waited....but then realized the truth......she remembered when sh=
e stabbed the Predacons in the back before, and knew Hell Beast would never=
 hire someone like herself...she left a note saying how Hell Beast would pr=
obably not hire her because of her bad experiences, and she would do it aga=
in, given the chance, and she left...she walked to the Alliance base...and =
tried to join.....Dracona asked her 3 questions..... "have you ever been me=
mbers of the other teams?....have you had any backstabbing pasts?....have y=
ou any respect for team mates?...." Dracona asked.... Plintissa answered: "=
yes, yes, and maybe, it depends if the members or as dumb as Liono Prime...=
." she said.....she spoke all truth..... "well, lets see, you can have a po=
sition..in the scrap heap!.." Dracona yelled...she fired at Plintissa...Pli=
ntissa admits that she would have tried to take over anyway....and she walk=
s on....
